entry.source: This is a request from me, the next {F804,5}King of Tokyo.{F804,0}{F801}{F804,5}Let's take Shinjuku! It's northwest from{F801}Kasumigaseki{F804,0} and has tons of supplies and{F801}{F804,5}neurishers.{F804,0} We'll probably have to {F804,5}fight the one{F801}in charge there,{F804,0} but I'll be right behind you{F801}{F804,5}Intruders.{F804,0} If worse comes to worst, I'll be sure{F801}to collect your ashes.{F801}
